name: Reborn (itch) (Zwiebelgian)
description:
This is my submission for the wowie! jam 3.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller. This is by no means finished and is rather buggy, sorry about that. I still hope it's playable.

Controls:
Swing sword/shoot bow: Mouse button(any)
Switch Weapon: Space
Move: W/A/S/D

Why this fits the theme:
Every time you die, you respawn with more lives and more arrows. 

Failure is Progress.

Up above you can find the source code/executeable or you can play it in your browser down below and if that doesn't work, here is the link to the official scratch website: 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/494866473
